body_html:
@manishkm , @ChengduoZhao
Hi, I got the same error lately too, bug error info cannot be searched except this new page.
I guess it's the problem of new version for some dependency packages.

I compared several packages(gcc, cuda, cudnn, bazel and...) with other tensorflow installation position, I doubt it the bug of bazel(latest version: 0.17.2). So...

  1. rm -fr ~/.bazel ~/.bazelrc
  2. install bazel (version: 0.11.1, maybe others)
  3. bazel build ...

It's okay!

body:
@manishkm , @ChengduoZhao 
Hi, I got the same error lately too, bug error info cannot be searched except this new page.
I guess it's the problem of new version for some dependency packages.

I compared several packages(gcc, cuda, cudnn, bazel and...) with other tensorflow  installation position, I doubt it the bug of bazel(latest version: 0.17.2). So...

1. rm -fr ~/.bazel ~/.bazelrc
2. install bazel (version: 0.11.1, maybe others)
3. bazel build ...

It's okay!
